game.name: The Saint Wife's Newlywed Trials
game.shortDescription: Dirk, the hero who saved the world, was granted the title of crown prince for defeating the Demon Lord. He was accompanied on his journey by Marianne, a priestess from the countryside. However, the future emperor isn't permitted to marry a commoner, so their fairy-tale ending was never meant to be.
